data.communities: will be discussed on pdx.pm as soon as I get it releasable
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Mail::Spam sounds like a good compliment to Mail::Audit. The module
    this namespace will want (but not need) to work with. It's also a
    good name because it leaves up the possibility to impliment multiple
    sub classed detection schemes. For example Mail::Spam::Bayesian or
    Mail::Spam::Random_Delete. :)
